review: 基础款的AI觉醒故事，没法给人太大惊喜，但经典永不过时，加上简洁并且跟故事和谐的视效，整体上让人很平静。

author: {'steamid': '76561198040135781', 'num_games_owned': 582, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 151, 'last_played': 1652675066}
review:
GREAT SKOT!!!  I don't really know how best to express my feelings toward this game.  I was looking at my list of "installed" and trying to find something I could play real quick and then delete to free up some space to install some other games.  It didn't take long for me to get hooked and now I'm not going to uninstall Able Black. It is staying in my "installed" and is now an, and might I add a very much deserved, addition to my favorites.

It's not often that a game, especially one that's not much more than words on a screen, can elicit such an emotional response.  I found myself feeling like I was the main character, not just playing a game.  I felt the ups and downs on a very real level and I love it.

Thank-you, Skot, for making this game and I look forward to continuing to find the secrets it holds.  I also look forward to your next project, if any.  I am definitely going to be talking about Able Black with my friends and trying to share it with as many people as possible.

Cheers.

author: {'steamid': '76561198269172896', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 292, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 241, 'last_played': 1651980900}
review: Hi, Skot! My name is Awin, and i absolutely loved your game. Any game that has you wishing you could have more and more after the end is the best kind. I am in love with these kinds of games, the twists and turns and the puzzles, the way you think you've found everything but you really haven't. I hope you come out with more games soon, I can't wait to play them.

author: {'steamid': '76561199073525845', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 97, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1596176099}
review:
孤独与绝望是情感的出发点，求助是人的本能。

等了很久，终于玩了。纯粹冲着题材和漂亮的界面来的。
作为一个主打剧情的小游戏，其中的剧情已经屡见不鲜，在科幻范围内被讨论来又讨论去，[spoiler]我即是Jack Jack即是我 我杀我自己 蠢逼AI MoTheR 人类完蛋了但又还没完[/spoiler]，甚至[spoiler]AI疯了[/spoiler]也是如此没有新意，全世界的科幻宅有几个没看过[spoiler]2001[/spoiler]啊！
谜题也是随大众地意识流。其中反复出现的意象如蛾子、蜜蜂、头骨、乌鸦、狼和狗[spoiler]狗崽天下第一！没杀狗你真是好样的ABLE BLACK[/spoiler]仿佛在各个寓言中已经阐释了，又好像还没有。如果能出个系列，像锈湖一样，这样的意象绝对是好的；如果是在单个游戏内（流程还很短）就让人有点无解。难度= =？题目太模糊了，指示极其不清晰。算了，买故事送游戏。

+ 上佳的音乐效果
+ “五彩斑斓黑”的优秀美术风格
+ 氛围营造得很好
+ 各色彩蛋（我指的不是[spoiler]上上下下左右左右BA[/spoiler]
+ 长度适中

- 谜题有待改进
- 故事欠缺新意
- 人物（蠢AI）缺乏魅力

author: {'steamid': '76561198064392148', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 231, 'playtime_forever': 116, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 116, 'last_played': 1593776739}
review:
[i]"What is my purpose?"[/i]


Able Black is a narrative game with puzzles that is currently free on the Apple store. 

I found the game surprisingly good. I thought at first that the game was just a series of puzzles. But in fact, it also tells a very intriguing and thrilling sci-fi story about the path to self-awareness of an android named Able Black. The story is mysterious and very well told and we just want to keep playing eager to know how it progresses. And so the game could easily be finished in one setting. But beware that there is actually a lot to read and not than many puzzles.

The game is not very long and one playthrough should take about 2 hours. The game in itself consists of series of moral choices questions and varied logic puzzles intertwined with story-telling. After completing the main game, there are also a few bonus clickable icons to unlock that add some extra elements to the story. 
Puzzles don't present too much difficulty but it depends on your experience with solving logic puzzles and riddles. 

In all, this is a very well designed narrative puzzle game that I wish had been longer. I am looking forward to play more games from this dev in the future.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006986577', 'num_games_owned': 684, 'num_reviews': 467, 'playtime_forever': 113, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1593584836}
review: What a great game: puzzles and a fantastic philosophical journey!  Hope to see more from Skot!

author: {'steamid': '76561198331555490', 'num_games_owned': 1519, 'num_reviews': 900, 'playtime_forever': 88, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 88, 'last_played': 1588459196}
review:
시민권 시험을 통과하고 폐기당하지 않기 위해 고군분투하는 안드로이드 Able Black의 이야기

비주얼 노벨 형식에 퍼즐이 합쳐진 형태의 게임으로, 텍스트를 통해 이야기를 풀어나가다가 시민권 시험을 볼 때는 퍼즐들을 직접 풀어나가는 방식으로 진행된다. 퍼즐들은 생각보다 만만하지는 않은 난이도지만, 다행히 게임 내 힌트를 제공하기 때문에 만약 막힌 것 같으면 게임 내 힌트를 보면서 풀어나갈 수 있다. (그래도 아래에 쓸 이유 때문에 힌트를 안 쓰는 걸 권장한다.) 퍼즐들을 풀지 않을 때는 텍스트를 읽어가면서 Able Black이 시민권 시험을 치지 않는 동안 무슨 활동을 했는지를 볼 수 있으며, 특정 시점을 읽다 보면 적절한 효과음이 들리면서 분위기 조성에 도움을 주기 때문에 꼭 소리를 들으면서 게임을 하는 걸 추천한다.

메인 스토리를 마치면 다양한 짧은 에필로그들을 해금할 수 있는데, 대부분은 특정 시간 또는 특정 날짜에만 해금할 수 있으니 컴퓨터 시간을 바꾸면서 해금하면 된다. 단, 에필로그 중 하나는 힌트를 안 쓰고 메인 스토리를 클리어해야 해금되기 때문에 만약 2회차를 하고 싶지 않으면 힌트를 안 쓰는 걸 권장한다.


결론적으로, 짧고 분위기 있는 텍스트 형식의 게임이다. 분량이 1시간 정도로 짧긴 하지만 애초에 가격 자체가 저렴해서 게임이 지나치게 짧다고 생각되지 않았기 때문에 추천.

여담) 도전과제 100%를 좋아하는 사람들이라면 주의할 점이 있는데.... 도전과제 중 미니게임에 999점을 넘겨야 하는 도전과제가 있다. 미니게임 자체는 어렵지 않은데, 999점을 넘기는 일 자체가 시간이 좀 걸리고 미니게임 중 일시정지가 안 되기 때문에 (Esc키를 누르면 메인 화면으로 이동한다 ! ) 행운을 빈다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198145971581', 'num_games_owned': 119, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 148, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 139, 'last_played': 1527192978}
review:
Able Black is amazing. Simply amazing. I think the story was executed very well and it even made me emotional with the twist at the end. I highly recommend this game for anyone who loves a good story that leaves an impression. You have to read throuhout the whole game though so if you don't like that, this isn't for you. Also the puzzles and riddles are very clever, it goes from 'easy as pie' to 'where's the walkthrough' in one chapter. The design is so simple too, with it mostly being black and white with the splash of color at the beginning of each chapter. I love it.  
Overall I give this game a 9/10 

-1 cause I got a little bored reading but nevertheless, I loved it in the end.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993586090', 'num_games_owned': 2048, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 86, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1486975941}

author: {'steamid': '76561198016413826', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 249, 'last_played': 1484230142}
review:
Thanks for making this game, Skot!

장문의 영어 스크립트를 읽을 수 있다면 굉장히 흥미로운 퍼즐게임.

화면 중앙에 오는 스크립트에 맞춰서 효과음이 나오도록한 연출 아주 마음에 듬.

테스트 3~4부터 효과음 싱크가 조금씩 늦어지는건 1인개발자 인디게임이니까 이해해주자.

여주인공(?) 웃음소리 참 듣기좋았음.

UUDDLRLRBASTART 헉헉

인터페이스 깔끔하고, 

숨겨진 요소들도 간단하지만 스토리에 잘 버무려서 맛깔나게 내놨다.

가격도 담배한갑 정도밖에 안함. 싸다 싸. 그러니까 사서 하세요.

author: {'steamid': '76561198191143537', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 114, 'last_played': 1484165863}
review:
Dear Skot,
	Your game “Able Black: Sleepwalker” is brilliant. The only time I was disappointed was when it ended. It had a very unique interactive style which I found extremely likable. I thought the story was wonderful. I really don't have much to tell you but about how great it was. I definitely would recommend this game and I will in in the future. 

This game is great for those who like reading stories with thought provoking themes and simple but challenging puzzles.

The only "improvement" I can see is to lengthen the story. I want more!! Write more about Able Black's adventures, please!! Thanks for the great game :)

author: {'steamid': '76561197976597747', 'num_games_owned': 25580, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 114, 'last_played': 1483550482}
review:
The biggest compliment I can make a game is that I want more of it once I've finished it - and Able Black falls into that category. I went into it blind and found the mix of visual/digital novel and puzzle game to be quite refreshing. It's an interesting experience, rather casual but with quite a bit of humor. If you're familiar with Sci-Fi works of Asimov for example you will feel right at home but it's by no means necessary background.
I'm looking for experiences in games more than bare mechanics and in this regard the game delivered more emotion and intrigue than a lot of blockbuster movies. It has that curiosity factor of wanting to know how the story progresses. And with different paths to explore and some easter eggs in there I think there's enough content to warrant the price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198246645870', 'num_games_owned': 61, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 246, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1580035184}
review:
To be honest, i wasnt expecting much from this game.  i just expected some puzzles and a story. but Able black is honestly so much more. the story really invests you, and brings out a lot of emotion.  the puzzles are quite easy at first, but get quite tricky as time go by.  normally im not too into puzzle games, but having an entire story accompany the puzzles, makes them so much more interesting. the plot twist really took me surpise, and honestly left me auidibly going 

 "wait...oh....oh!"

its a very interesting game, with great atmosphere, and nice little secrets here and there. good job Skot

author: {'steamid': '76561198121850993', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 98, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1482781346}
review: Very cool game. I like the way it makes you consider a lot of different options and choices about your own life perspective  through smart puzzles and storytelling. Looking forward for some more, I'd love to see how it unfolds! :-)

author: {'steamid': '76561198166990519', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 366, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1503355936}
review:
Okay, I've honestly never really loved a game quite as much as I've loved this. I've certainly never really wanted to recommend one. If you're looking for something that is somehow based in logic puzzles, existentialism, philosophy, challenge of authority, nostalgia, and deep rooted emotions, look no further. Play Able Black. Somehow, within minutes of play time, I was hooked -- not just hooked, but keenly aware of my own feelings.

The game is on the dark side. It is not a game that makes you feel comfortable while playing. It intentionally unnerves. Still, I think it's very much worth the play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198259528618', 'num_games_owned': 180, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 133, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1482832981}
review:
Able Black is a pretty cool puzzle-story game, where you play as Able Black, an android whose main purpose is passing his Citizenship Exam in order to become designated to help humanity from potential disaster. This is the updated Steam version of the original mobile version of the game.  

The way the game is presented is by two parts - the Story part, and the Puzzle-solving part:
- The Story part consists of mainly text. You'll be presented with the story of Able Black and the overall circumstances that lead him to take the Citizenship Exam.
- Then there's the Puzzle part, which consists of stories, imagery and options that you shall pick depending on the question or objective that's being asked for you to do. After solving the Puzzles, the cycle starts over with another Story part and so on.

The Story is, without fail, pretty good. If you're into science fiction stories, where you're given enough space to form your own conjectures until the story proves you what the truth is, then you sure are going to enjoy this. Though it's mostly only text and very few visuals appear, I found myself highly interested in it, wanting more. The few turns and twists that were slowly presented to me, were enough to make me continue all the way to the end. On the other hand, there's the Puzzles.
The Puzzles the game includes are not particularly hard, but they sure are meant to be given a focused line of thinking. You will be given all the information you need, so there's no need to worry about obtuse puzzles. In any case, you will be given hints for each puzzle, so don't be afraid to use them if you get stuck.

Something I need to remark, without trying to give any kind of spoilers: if you do NOT like psychological tests or the feeling of being psychoanalized by the choices you make, then I'm afraid to say this isn't the game for you. The game will present you with moral dilemmas and choices related to the Story and the game will present you with a result/conclusion based on what you choose. If you feel not interested or annoyed by this kind of gameplay, be wary if you still decide to try this game.

I really enjoyed this game, it was a good experience and I highly recommend it. The overall design and presentation the game gives on both the Story and the Puzzles is very cool; even though "simplistic/minimalistic" looking, it works in favor of the game, making it enjoyable and giving it a more polished look, a detail that seems to be overlooked by several indie games.
Though the main story is a bit short (around 1.5 hrs, puzzles included) you still are presented with secrets that you can feel free to explore in the game if you so desire. 

This is a very cool little game, and I'm really glad I was able to enjoy as one of the last games of the year. Hopefully it will get more attention!

author: {'steamid': '76561198261583880', 'num_games_owned': 663, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 21, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1482378184}
review:
Able Black是一款文本解谜游戏，简单的黑白背景中滚动文本，让人可以静下心来读小说的感觉。但游戏20+分钟内，除了文本就是文本，作为英语良好的非英语母语者我已经开始注意力分散了。
+表现形式新颖，纯文本与解谜结合
+黑色背景白色文本，简直读书利器
+剧本好，词汇不艰深，科幻控福利
-大量文本出没，考验玩家耐心
补充：自从大学毕业之后都没这么认真看过书了，而且剧情很不错，代入感很强，只是我真的很困（噗），所以英语好睡得好集中力够的同学可以试试。
